alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Arapahoe, east central Denver and southwestern Adams Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 220 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Aurora, or 14 miles east of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Denver, Aurora, northeastern Centennial, southern Denver International Airport, Bennett, Watkins, Manila Village, Buckley SFB and Arapahoe Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
